name: ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bilevel w/H5i™ and ClimateLine™ Tube
description:
Features

  • Track your progress with ResMed's SleepSeeker!
  • Quiet Operation – ResMed offers the quietest device motor currently available
  • Fully Integrated H5i Humidifier with Climate Control and ClimateLine Heated Tubing - Small, compact machine design that includes a full humidifier with automated water heating based on room temperature and humidity levels
  • Improved Easy-Breathe Waveform Technology – Built to work with your own respiratory patterns, not against them
  • Enhanced Rise Time Features – As you fall asleep, your pressures are gradually increased to allow for a slower ramp to prescribed pressure
  • Vsync Technology – Leak compensation to ensure that you receive the right pressures, despite mask leaks that may happen
  • Advanced Data Recording and Management – Various measurements and formulas to determine how successful your therapy is. Records both compliance and efficacy data
  • User Friendly Design – Easy-to-use menu and sleek, sophisticated design
  • Optional Equipment Integration – Have your usage monitored wirelessly, or connect a pulse oximeter for full data recording integration of your pulse and oxygen levels
Get the complete package with the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level with H5i Humidifier and ClimateLine™ Tubing. The compliance data management system, ClimateLine™ Tubing, quiet operating motor, Easy-Breathe feature and much more within the framework of a stylish unit ensure sleep apnea therapy is at its best.

The ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level motor has been engineered for a much quieter operation which translates into a better night’s sleep for the user as well as the bed partner. The sound traveling down through the tubing and mask will be less noticeable or completely undetectable with the new motor. The new motor technology has been improved through much research and enhancements over the predecessor to the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level.

For many years, CPAP and BiLevel users have struggled with water condensation in tubing as well as masks. ResMed has tackled the condensation problems with the introduction of the ClimateLine™ Humidification System offered on the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level unit. Stop the water buildup with the ClimateLine ™ Tubing system and enjoy the comfort of smooth compliant therapy without all the interruptions. The ClimateLine™ system has an automated feature that can determine the room temperature thereby adjusting the water temperature to ensure the room temperature and tubing temperature aren’t working against one another. ResMed has developed the very best temperature control system for users looking for the comfort without losing the advanced technology and compliance.

Easy-Breathe EPR is ResMed’s answer for users experiencing difficulties when inhaling or exhaling. The ResMed S9 CPAP™ S Bi-Level unit comes equipped with Easy-Breathe EPR so every patient will benefit from this technology. Smooth and easy breathing is possible with Easy-Breathe EPR because this feature traces natural breathing patterns and adapts intuitively to the patient’s cycles of breaths. The natural breathing patterns of the user will not be interrupted because the transitions are completely in sync with the user’s exhalation and inhalation.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.
specifications:

  • Weight:3.35 lb
  • Dimensions:7.25" x 11.25" x 3.75"
  • Warranty:2 years

  • Software Available:No
  • Ramp:0-45 min. (5 min. increments)
  • Exhalation Relief:EPR

  • Altitude Adjustment:Automatic

name: ResMed VPAP™ S BiLevel with Easy-Breathepdecker2
description:
Features

  • Compact size and sleek design make use during travel and home use equally easy and enjoyable.
  • New, exclusive dual fan motor design provides a quieter sound due to the lower RPMs required by each fan to maintain pressure. It also increases the durability of the machine by sharing the workload between two fan systems instead of the one fan system employed by other machines.
  • New whisper-quiet operation is 75% quieter than competing bilevel devices.
  • New Easy-Breathe technology combines new software, a quieter motor and improved synchronization with the patient's breathing cycle for maximum comfort and a quiet night’s sleep.
  • The VPAP S is compatible with the S8 ResLink, ResScan Software and S8 ResTraxx. Built-in ResScan data card capability makes objective measurement of treatment use and treatment effectiveness simple and straightforward.
  • Usage-based compliance download for accurate patient monitoring, including clinical and efficacy data recording within the machine for 365 days (included ResScan Data Card will allow you to download data for your doctor).
  • ResMed’s Vsync leak management algorithm and TiControl breath synchronization control for accurate and comfortable pressures.
The ResMed VPAP S BiLevel System with Easy-Breathe Technology is a all-new bilevel machine from ResMed featuring many innovations to further improve user compliance and comfort. Setting a new industry standard in quiet, reliable, and comfortable sleep therapy, ResMed’s new sophisticated motor design delivers superior performance at a lower effort while cutting device noise significantly (75% quieter than competitive bilevel devices, the lowest noise level on the market!).

The system is exceptionally compact and convenient, making it ideal for travel or home use. Featuring ResMed’s improved motor design with Easy-Breathe technology, the VPAP S BiLevel System offers S (spontaneous) mode in which two treatment pressures are set for inspiration (IPAP) and expiration (EPAP). In addition to traditional spontaneous bilevel therapy, VPAP S features ResMed’s Vsync leak management algorithm (to ensure any mask leaks are correctly compensated for at the machine), TiControl breath synchronization control (enabling the most comfortable and natural bilevel therapy), and trigger and cycle sensitivity to further synchronize with the user's personal breathing cycle as it changes throughout the night.

name: ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bilevel w/H5i™
description:
Features

  • Track your progress with ResMed's SleepSeeker!
  • Quiet Operation – ResMed offers the quietest device motor currently available
  • Fully Integrated H5i Humidifier with Climate Control - Small, compact machine design that includes a full humidifier with automated water heating based on room temperature and humidity levels
  • Improved Easy-Breathe Waveform Technology – Built to work with your own respiratory patterns, not against them
  • Enhanced Rise Time Features – As you fall asleep, your pressures are gradually increased to allow for a slower ramp to prescribed pressure
  • Vsync Technology – Leak compensation to ensure that you receive the right pressures, despite mask leaks that may happen
  • Advanced Data Recording and Management – Various measurements and formulas to determine how successful your therapy is. Records both compliance and efficacy data
  • User Friendly Design – Easy-to-use menu and sleek, sophisticated design
  • Optional Equipment Integration – Have your usage monitored wirelessly, or connect a pulse oximeter for full data recording integration of your pulse and oxygen levels
One of the industry leaders in advanced technology, ResMed has done it again with the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level with H5i™ Humidification. ResMed has always tackled the concerns of physician, clinicians, and especially respiratory patients and hasn’t failed to date. The new ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level unit brings the answers to data compliance, humidification, patient comfort and much more. ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level with H5i Humidification unit has all the elements a Bi-Level users needs for comfort and compliance and all physicians need to deliver the best possible treatment. This is why the ResMed brand has been considered one of the best.

Monitoring the progress of the user can be followed with ease by the physician and/or respiratory therapist with the data management system function standard with all ResMed S9 units. The data management system will never fail to provide the user’s clinicians with accurate, easy to access, and complete data. Your physician and/or staff can download via the SD card that is provided, print, and review for treatment progress to determine the next course of action if any. And now even users can access and monitor their progress by visiting ResMed's SleepSeeker . The instructions are super easy once the patient creates a login. The ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level with H5i Humidification System will record the sleep therapy progress, the SleepSeeker will proved the data for review, and the user’s treatment track will always be optimal.

Noise levels on sleep therapy units have always been a deterrent for the users and cause for concern for the bed partners. Well no more, the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level with H5i Humidification noise level is the lowest available on Bi-PAP units at 24 dB(A). This is below 30 dB(A) documented to be the highest acceptable noise level in the bedroom for quality sleep. Bed partners will never develop their own sleeping issues because noise level on the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level with H5i Humidification is so low.

Easy-Breathe EPR has become the standard all others look because ResMed has developed the smoothest transitions available in the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level with H5i Humidification unit. No harsh or abrupt pressure will ever cause the patient to awake or not be able to go to sleep with the Easy-Breathe EPR function. The Easy-Breathe EPR detects the patient’s breathing patterns and simply but smoothly adjusts to make certain the pressure doesn’t alarm the user. ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level with H5i Humidification Easy-Breathe EPR determines the best possible pressure during the patient’s inhalation and exhalation without delivering too much or too little.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

name: ResMed VPAP™ Auto 25 BiLevel with Easy-Breathe and H4i™ Heated Humidifier
description:
Features

  • Compact size and sleek design make use during travel and home use equally easy and enjoyable.
  • Combines the clinically proven AutoSet algorithm with the supreme comfort of ResMed’s Easy-Breathe technology to make breathing easier for patients with OSA, noncompliant CPAP users, and those who require additional ventilatory support.
  • New, exclusive dual fan motor design provides a quieter sound due to the lower RPMs required by each fan to maintain pressure. It also increases the durability of the machine by sharing the workload between two fan systems instead of the one fan system employed by other machines.
  • New whisper-quiet operation is 75% quieter than competing bilevel devices.
  • New Easy-Breathe technology combines new software, a quieter motor and improved synchronization with the patient's breathing cycle for maximum comfort and a quiet night’s sleep.
  • The VPAP S is compatible with the S8 ResLink, ResScan Software and S8 ResTraxx. Built-in ResScan data card capability makes objective measurement of treatment use and treatment effectiveness simple and straightforward.
  • Usage-based compliance download for accurate patient monitoring, including clinical and efficacy data recording within the machine for 365 days (included ResScan Data Card will allow you to download data for your doctor).
  • ResMed’s Vsync leak management algorithm and TiControl breath synchronization control for accurate and comfortable pressures.
The ResMed VPAP Auto 25 BiLevel System with Easy-Breathe Technology and H4i Heated Humidifier is the all-new auto-titrating bilevel machine from ResMed featuring many innovations to further improve user compliance and comfort. Setting a new industry standard in quiet, reliable, and comfortable sleep therapy, ResMed’s new sophisticated motor design delivers superior performance at a lower effort while cutting device noise significantly.

The system is exceptionally compact and convenient, making it ideal for travel or home use. Featuring ResMed’s improved motor design with Easy-Breathe technology, the VPAP Auto 25 BiLevel System's unique VAuto mode uses ResMed's AutoSet technology to automatically adjust to the users pressure needs as they vary throughout the night (adjusting pressures for both inspiration, or IPAP, and for expiration, or EPAP). With ResMed’s clinically proven AutoSet algorithm, VPAP Auto 25 is able to detect flow limitation and act preemptively to prevent apneic and snoring events. Equipped with three modes (VAuto, S and CPAP), VPAP Auto 25 is the most versatile device available and comes in a conveniently small and sleek package.

name: ResMed AirCurve™ 10 S w/HumidAir™ BiLevel
description:
Features

  • Track your progress and receive personalized coaching throughout therapy with ResMed's myAir™!
  • Optional ClimateLineAir™ Tube
  • Quiet Operation – ResMed offers the quietest device motor currently available
  • Improved Easy-Breathe Waveform Technology – Built to work with your own respiratory patterns, not against them
  • Built-in wireless technology for easy data access
  • Enhanced Rise Time Features – As you fall asleep, your pressures are gradually increased to allow for a slower ramp to prescribed pressure
  • Vsync Technology – Leak compensation to ensure that you receive the right pressures
  • Advanced Data Recording and Management – Various measurements and formulas to determine how successful your therapy is. Records both compliance and efficacy data
  • User Friendly Design – Easy-to-use menu and sleek, sophisticated design
  • Optional Equipment Integration – Have your usage monitored wirelessly, or connect a pulse oximeter for full data recording integration of your pulse and oxygen levels


Compliance driven and innovative technology drives the ResMed AirCurve™ 10 S with HumidAir™ BiLevel Humidification System. With added pressure support and easy adjusting features for users having difficulty adjusting to therapy, the AirCurve™ 10 S with HumidAir™ BiLevel makes it all possible and then some. No matter the pressure settings prescribed this BiLevel/BiPAP delivers the right therapy along with the comfort needed to make therapy compliant and easy.

The ResMed AirCurve™ 10 S BiLevel is the go to device for users that have a fixed pressure as well as noncompliant patients and their clinicians. When patients have difficult time adjusting to sleep apnea therapy and require added support this is the unit to turn to. There are two separate adjustable pressures that assist in a more noticeable comfortable therapy session for the patient. With easy settings and adjusting the user will find the ResMed AirCurve™ 10 S with HumidAir™ BiLevel the easiest and most comfortable unit available not to mention compliant.

ResMed's ClimateLineAir™ tube provides added comfort and less condensation buildup in the tubing during therapy. Along with the enhanced Climate Control Auto feature which monitors and regulates the humidification system within the HumidAir™ humidifier, the ClimateLineAir™ tube controls the air temperature to reduce the water buildup. These two features work together to provide optimal comfort without condensation and atmosphere temperature change disruptions. Select the ClimateLineAir™ Tube during the selection process to receive this advanced technology.

Quiet operation as always with the ResMed devices, the ResMed AirCurve™ 10 S with HumidAir™ Humidification System is at 26 dBA. One of the quietest devices on the market today, the users get the sleep apnea therapy needed without the added noise produced by other brands. Clinicians and patients agree that device noise interrupts therapy and causes more difficulties during therapy but with a quiet unit like the AirCurve™ 10 S the patient can rest peacefully while receiving therapy.

Easy patient data monitoring systems through ResMed's built-in wireless technology, AirView/easyCare online, AirView's remote assist, and the myAir™ systems. BiLevel patient's and clinicians can monitor therapy progression and keep up with any updates as needed via the ResMed's myAir™ program.

The ResMed EPR is still a standard feature on the ResMed AirCurve™ BiLevel devices which allows for smooth therapy transitions that will not alarm the patient while asleep. Abrupt pressure changes can alarm the users causing interruptions in therapy as well as difficulties in sleep patterns which cause non-compliance. With the ResMed EPR Easy-Breathe technology, users will experience a quiet and uninterrupted therapy session with the smooth and delicate transitions in pressure change. Therapy will remain intact without disruptions.

AirCurve Advanced Technology

TiControl

The Ticontrol feature sets a minimum and maximum time limit for the patient’s perfect natural air flow. TiControl provides timely intervention when necessary during therapy when the patient is having difficulty but allows a normal cycle of breaths to determine need. Simply set the minimum and maximum time limits and let the TiControl do the rest.

Trigger Sensitivity

Use the Trigger Sensitivity feature to synchronize the respiratory efforts between the patient and the AirCurve 10 device. The sensitivity settings allow the unit to optimize the reading of the patient’s breaths and use the information to perform up to the patient needs and beyond.

Vsync

Synchronized therapy between you and your unit is possible with the Vsync technology. This advanced leak management feature is a standard feature with all AirCurve 10 devices.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

name: ResMed S9 VPAP™ Auto Bilevel Machine
description:
Features

  • Track your progress with ResMed's SleepSeeker!
  • Quiet Operation – ResMed offers the quietest device motor currently available
  • Improved Easy-Breathe Waveform Technology – Built to work with your own respiratory patterns, not against them
  • Enhanced AutoSet Algorithm – The auto technology ensures you receive the best treatment pressures for your therapy throughout the night
  • Vsync Technology – Leak compensation to ensure that you receive the right pressures, despite mask leaks that may happen
  • Advanced Data Recording and Management – Various measurements and formulas to determine how successful your therapy is; records both compliance and efficacy data
  • User Friendly Design – Easy-to-use menu and sleek, sophisticated design
  • Optional Equipment Integration – Have your usage monitored wirelessly, or connect a pulse oximeter for full data recording integration of your pulse and oxygen levels
Known for their innovative CPAP masks and advanced sleep therapy technology, ResMed has released the bilevel machines in their S9 VPAP product line. The S9 VPAP series combines the sleek design of the popular ResMed S9 machines with the advanced technology and features of the VPAP bilevel devices to create a machine that delivers more to you than any other bilevel machine available.

The ResMed S9 VPAP Auto Bilevel machine delivers two treatment pressures, an inspiratory and expiratory pressure, for treatment of different forms of sleep apnea and other respiratory disorders. This auto bilevel adjusts both the pressure on inhalation and the pressure on exhalation automatically, ensuring that you receive the correct level of therapy throughout the night. An improvement over the S8 VPAP Auto, the ResMed S9 VPAP Auto includes the Enhanced Easy-Breathe Technology to increase the comfort level of your therapy.

The S9 Auto Bilevel also includes many other features that make sleep therapy more comfortable and convenient for you. The patented Climate Control humidification system is available with the optional, fully integrated H5i humidifier (not included with this model). Climate Control automatically determines the best water temperature to maintain high humidity levels in the air you breathe in through the night. Optional wireless therapy monitoring, optional integrated pulse oximetry, a therapy measurement called Sleep Quality Indicator, the quietest motor available, and advanced data recording all combine in the sleek and easy-to-use S9 body to create one of the most intelligent bilevel devices on the market today. The ResMed S9 VPAP Auto Bilevel is clearly one of the best-in-class devices available.

name: ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bilevel
description:
Features

  • Track your progress with ResMed's SleepSeeker!
  • Quiet Operation – ResMed offers the quietest device motor currently available
  • Improved Easy-Breathe Waveform Technology – Built to work with your own respiratory patterns, not against them
  • Enhanced Rise Time Features – As you fall asleep, your pressures are gradually increased to allow for a slower ramp to prescribed pressure
  • Vsync Technology – Leak compensation to ensure that you receive the right pressures, despite mask leaks that may happen
  • Advanced Data Recording and Management – Various measurements and formulas to determine how successful your therapy is
  • User Friendly Design – Easy-to-use menu and sleek, sophisticated design
  • Optional Equipment Integration – Have your usage monitored wirelessly, or connect a pulse oximeter for full data recording integration of your pulse and oxygen levels
ResMed always amazes the respiratory industry through innovatative and forward thinking technology that astounds and delivers results. With the introduction of their newest series, the S9 systems, nothing has been left to the imagination. The ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level has every characteristics known in the Bi-PAP world and then some perhaps this is why some customers and clinician consider the ResMed brand the top of the line when compared to other brands. Don’t think twice, get one today for the very best quality and therapy compliance.

Quiet doesn’t began to describe the noise level of the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level. Get the prescribed sleep needed without the noise heard from most units on the market. At 24 dB(A), the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S BiLevel is well below the 30 dB(A) which is considered an acceptable level for the bedroom. Therapy with the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level will not interrupt the sleep of the user or bed partner. The ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level motor has been designed with the users as well as loved ones in mind. Leave the cares of noise behind, get yours today.

Physicians, clinicians, and even patient’s can monitor the progress with the optimal data management system available on the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level unit. There are various optional avenues provided to ensure the patient therapy is complete, compliant, and comfortable. With the new SleepSeeker data management system provided by ResMed, patients can now monitor their therapy. Simply go to ResMed's SleepSeeker , insert your SD card, and follow the instructions. The clinicians and physicians monitoring system will bring the users therapy full circle with a more in depth look at the compliance data.



Breath and rest easy knowing when therapy begins the adaptation difficulties decrease while acclimation to the ResMed therapy increases. The ResMed Easy-Breathe EPR feature maps out the user’s breathing patterns and adjust accordingly. ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level has Easy-Breathe EPR as a standard attribute not an added luxury because ResMed understands quality sleep means quality compliance which is the ultimate goal of the user’s clinician and physician. Easy-Breathe EPR detects exhalation and inhalation of the patient, quickly determining pressure changes while administering a smooth delivery of pressure. No harsh pressure will ever be delivered with the ResMed S9 VPAP™ S Bi-Level unit.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

name: ResMed AirCurve™ 10 VAuto w/HumidAir™ BiLevel
description:
Features

  • Track your progress and receive personalized coaching throughout therapy with ResMed's myAir™!
  • Optional ClimateLineAir™ Tube
  • Quiet Operation – ResMed offers the quietest device motor currently available
  • Improved Easy-Breathe Waveform Technology – Built to work with your own respiratory patterns, not against them
  • Built-in wireless technology for easy data access
  • Enhanced Rise Time Features – As you fall asleep, your pressures are gradually increased to allow for a slower ramp to prescribed pressure
  • Vsync Technology – Leak compensation to ensure that you receive the right pressures
  • Advanced Data Recording and Management – Various measurements and formulas to determine how successful your therapy is. Records both compliance and efficacy data
  • User Friendly Design – Easy-to-use menu and sleek, sophisticated design
  • Optional Equipment Integration – Have your usage monitored wirelessly, or connect a pulse oximeter for full data recording integration of your pulse and oxygen levels


The AirCurve™ 10 VAuto with HumidAir™ BiLevel automatically determines the pressure needed based on the patient’s breathing patterns. The advanced AirCurve™ 10 VAuto is an auto-adjusting bilevel/bipap with both AutoSet™ algorithm exclusively by ResMed and Easy-Breathe waveform for patients requiring increased pressure support. The VAuto holds the airway open while preserving the fixed pressure by adjusting the baseline pressure.

ResMed's ClimateLineAir™ tube provides added comfort and less condensation buildup in the tubing during therapy. Along with the enhanced Climate Control Auto feature which monitors and regulates the humidification system within the HumidAir™ BiPAP humidifier, the ClimateLineAir™ tube controls the air temperature to reduce the water buildup. These two features work together to provide optimal comfort without condensation and atmosphere temperature change disruptions. Select the ClimateLineAir™ Tube during the selection process to receive this advanced technology.

Quiet operation as always with the ResMed devices, the ResMed AirCurve™ 10 VAuto with HumidAir™ BiLevel/BiPAPHumidification System is at 26 dBA. One of the quietest devices on the market today, the users get the sleep apnea therapy needed without the added noise produced by other brands. Clinicians and patients agree that device noise interrupts therapy and causes more difficulties during therapy but with a quiet unit like the AirCurve™ 10 VAuto the patient can rest peacefully while receiving therapy.

Easy patient data monitoring systems through ResMed's built-in wireless technology, AirView/easyCare online, AirView's remote assist, and the myAir™ systems. Patient's and clinicians can monitor therapy progression and keep up with any updates as needed via the ResMed's myAir™ program.

The ResMed EPR is still a standard feature on the ResMed AirCurve™ devices which allows for smooth therapy transitions that will not alarm the patient while asleep. Abrupt pressure changes can alarm the users causing interruptions in therapy as well as difficulties in sleep patterns which cause non-compliance. With the ResMed EPR Easy-Breathe technology, users will experience a quiet and uninterrupted therapy session with the smooth and delicate transitions in pressure change. BiLevel/BiPAP therapy will remain intact without disruptions.

AirCurve Advanced Technology

TiControl

The Ticontrol feature sets a minimum and maximum time limit for the patient’s perfect natural air flow. TiControl provides timely intervention when necessary during therapy when the patient is having difficulty but allows a normal cycle of breaths to determine need. Simply set the minimum and maximum time limits and let the TiControl do the rest.

Trigger Sensitivity

Use the Trigger Sensitivity feature to synchronize the respiratory efforts between the patient and the AirCurve 10 device. The sensitivity settings allow the unit to optimize the reading of the patient’s breaths and use the information to perform up to the patient needs and beyond.

Vsync

Synchronized therapy between you and your unit is possible with the Vsync technology. This advanced leak management feature is a standard feature with all AirCurve 10 devices.

* PLEASE NOTE: ALWAYS drain your water chamber completely when transporting or moving your machine.

name: ResMed S9 VPAP™ Auto Bilevel w/H5i™ and ClimateLine™ Tube
description:
Features

  • Track your progress with ResMed's SleepSeeker!
  • Quiet Operation – ResMed offers the quietest device motor currently available
  • Fully Integrated H5i Humidifier with Climate Control and ClimateLine Heated Tubing - Small, compact machine design that includes a full humidifier with automated water heating based on room temperature and humidity levels
  • Improved Easy-Breathe Waveform Technology – Built to work with your own respiratory patterns, not against them
  • Enhanced AutoSet Algorithm – The auto technology ensures you receive the best treatment pressures for your therapy throughout the night
  • Vsync Technology – Leak compensation to ensure that you receive the right pressures, despite mask leaks that may happen
  • Advanced Data Recording and Management – Various measurements and formulas to determine how successful your therapy is. Records both compliance and efficacy data
  • User Friendly Design – Easy-to-use menu and sleek, sophisticated design
  • Optional Equipment Integration – Have your usage monitored wirelessly, or connect a pulse oximeter for full data recording integration of your pulse and oxygen levels
Known for their innovative CPAP masks and advanced sleep therapy technology, ResMed has released the bilevel machines in their S9 VPAP product line. The S9 VPAP series combines the sleek design of the popular ResMed S9 machines with the advanced technology and features of the VPAP bilevel devices to create a machine that delivers more to you than any other bilevel machine available.

The ResMed S9 VPAP Auto Bilevel machine delivers two treatment pressures, an inspiratory and expiratory pressure, for treatment of different forms of sleep apnea and other respiratory disorders. This auto bilevel adjusts both the pressure on inhalation and the pressure on exhalation automatically, ensuring that you receive the correct level of therapy throughout the night. An improvement over the S8 VPAP Auto, the ResMed S9 VPAP Auto includes the Enhanced Easy-Breathe Technology to increase the comfort level of your therapy.

The S9 VPAP Auto Bilevel also includes many other features that make sleep therapy more comfortable and convenient for you. The patented Climate Control humidification system is available with the fully integrated H5i humidifier and patented ClimateLine Heated Tubing that protects from rainout or less-than-optimal humidity levels (both included with this model). Climate Control automatically determines the best water temperature to maintain high humidity levels in the air you breathe in through the night. Optional wireless therapy monitoring, optional integrated pulse oximetry, a therapy measurement called Sleep Quality Indicator, the quietest motor available, and advanced data recording all combine in the sleek and easy-to-use S9 body to create one of the most intelligent bilevel devices on the market today. The ResMed S9 VPAP Auto Bilevel is clearly one of the best-in-class devices available.

name: ResMed VPAP™ S BiLevel with Easy-Breathe and H4i™ Heated Humidifier
description:
Features

  • Compact size and sleek design make use during travel and home use equally easy and enjoyable.
  • New, exclusive dual fan motor design provides a quieter sound due to the lower RPMs required by each fan to maintain pressure. It also increases the durability of the machine by sharing the workload between two fan systems instead of the one fan system employed by other machines.
  • New whisper-quiet operation is 75% quieter than competing bilevel devices.
  • New Easy-Breathe technology combines new software, a quieter motor and improved synchronization with the patient's breathing cycle for maximum comfort and a quiet night’s sleep.
  • The VPAP S is compatible with the S8 ResLink, ResScan Software and S8 ResTraxx. Built-in ResScan data card capability makes objective measurement of treatment use and treatment effectiveness simple and straightforward.
  • Usage-based compliance download for accurate patient monitoring, including clinical and efficacy data recording within the machine for 365 days (included ResScan Data Card will allow you to download data for your doctor).
  • ResMed’s Vsync leak management algorithm and TiControl breath synchronization control for accurate and comfortable pressures.
The ResMed VPAP S BiLevel System with Easy-Breathe Technology and H4i Heated Humidifier is a all-new bilevel machine from ResMed featuring many innovations to further improve user compliance and comfort. Setting a new industry standard in quiet, reliable, and comfortable sleep therapy, ResMed’s new sophisticated motor design delivers superior performance at a lower effort while cutting device noise significantly (75% quieter than competitive bilevel devices, the lowest noise level on the market!).

The system is exceptionally compact and convenient, making it ideal for travel or home use. Featuring ResMed’s improved motor design with Easy-Breathe technology, the VPAP S BiLevel System offers S (spontaneous) mode in which two treatment pressures are set for inspiration (IPAP) and expiration (EPAP). In addition to traditional spontaneous bilevel therapy, VPAP S features ResMed’s Vsync leak management algorithm (to ensure any mask leaks are correctly compensated for at the machine), TiControl breath synchronization control (enabling the most comfortable and natural bilevel therapy), and trigger and cycle sensitivity to further synchronize with the user's personal breathing cycle as it changes throughout the night.
